tweet: Recently, #Cardano has been keen on expanding and creating various online communities throughout the world. This, combined with its transparency and frequent AMAs, makes it one of the most supportive #crypto communities in the cryptosphere.   #ADA

On August 22 Hinrich Pfeifer from the Cardano Foundation will be attending and speaking at a #CardanoCommunity meetup in Berlin, together with Manuel - @TacticalGrace  @DarkoMijic. How does #Cardano separate itself from other #blockchains? Sign up here:  https://t.co/91mx9UMHYV

Our new series of dev progress videos will give you a unique behind-the-scenes look at all the latest #Cardano technical developments. Here's the second in the series, with the IOHK #Haskell team demoing the next iteration of multi-node communication  https://t.co/ARldh0n8ed…  https://t.co/WLITlPrpY6
